data.title: Manisha Koirala to divorce after 5 months?
data.meta_description: Bollywood actress posted thoughts about her husband Samrat Dahal on Facebook
data.text:
Bollywood actress Manisha Koirala posted her thoughts on facebook about wanting a divorce just five months after her marriage to Samrat Dahal. The actress deleted the post a few hours later.

Sources close to her revealed the actress she wrote it during a "moment" and that it was "silly", reports Indian daily Mid-Day.

Last Friday, the Bollywood actress wrote on Facebook that she was planning to get a divorce and hoped that the decision wouldn't hurt her parents.

Although the actress deleted the message within a a few hours of posting that status, the post had already spread like wildfire.

Koirala appeared happy after her marriage and had even spoken about wedded bliss after coming back from her honeymoon in Sievi, Finland. The actress has had a few traumatic relationships in the past.
